title: Their rarely seems to be a ship docked along the 5 large cranes at the Shipyard. How, can you have a port with only 1 or 2 ships a month? How possibly, with that few ships could the be a need for a new port?
text:
It's works out to more than a ship a day. Here's a previous answer:
